info.title: MUTUAL NON -DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT
parties:
AND  
DataWise Analytics LLP , a Limited Liability Partnership registered under the Limited 
Liability Partnership

If any provision of this Agreement is found to be 
unenforceable, the remainder shall be enforced as fully as possible.  
IN WITNESS WHEREOF , the Parties have executed this Agreement as of the Effective 
Date.  
For InnovateNext Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
legal_concepts:
Definition of Confidential Information  ‚ÄúConfidential Information ‚Äù shall mean any and 
all information, whether tangible or intangible, disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the 
Receiving Party, in any form whatsoever, including but not limited  to written, oral, visual, or 
electronic forms

Is required to be disclosed by 
law, regulation, or court order, provided that the Receiving Party gives th e Disclosing Party 
prompt written notice of such requirement to permit the Disclosing Party to seek a protective 
order or other appropriate remedy

Restrict access to Confidential Information to its employees, 
directors, advisors, or consultants on a "need -to-know" basis, provided that such 
Representatives are bound by confidentiality obligations no less restrictive than those 
contained in this Agreement

In the course of discussions concerning the Purpose, each Party (as a ‚Äú Disclosing Party ‚Äù) 
may disclose to the other Party (as a ‚Äú Receiving Party ‚Äù) certain non -public, confidential, or 
proprietary information

No License  Nothing i n this Agreement is intended to grant any rights to the Receiving 
Party under any patent, copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property right of the 
Disclosing Party, nor shall this Agreement grant the Receiving Party any rights in or to the 
Confide ntial Information other than the limited right to review such information for the 
Purpose

final.summary:
MUTUAL NON -DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT ‚Äì Simplified Summary

1. Parties involved:
o InnovateNext Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
o AND  
DataWise Analytics LLP , a Limited Liability Partnership registered under the Limited 
Liability Partnership
o If any provision of this Agreement is found to be 
unenforceable, the remainder shall be enforced as fully as possible.  
IN WITNESS WHEREOF , the Parties have executed this Agreement as of the Effective 
Date.  
For InnovateNext Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
o For DataWise Analytics LLP
2. Purpose: Definition of Confidential Information - The Parties agree that the competent courts in Mumbai, India shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim that arises out of or in connection with this Agreement.
3. During discussions, both parties may exchange confidential information (business plans, finances, customer lists, technical data, trade secrets, know-how, designs, source codes, marketing strategies, etc.).
4. Obligations of the Receiving Party:
o Keep the information in strict confidence and protect it like its own confidential data.
o Not share it with any third party without the written consent of the Disclosing Party.
o Use it only for the Purpose and nothing else.
o Share it only with employees, directors, advisors, or consultants who need to know, provided they also follow confidentiality obligations.
5. On termination or written request, the Receiving Party must return or destroy all confidential documents and copies.
6. Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India.
7. InnovateNext Technologies Pvt.
8. , a company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013, having its registered office at 7th Floor, Tech Park One, Powai, Mumbai, Maharashtra 4 1.
9. Sunita Sharma Address: Flat 801, Royal Palms, Goregaon, Mumbai 400065.
10. The Parties agree that the competent courts in Mumbai, India shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim that arises out of or in connection with this Agreement.

legal_entities: registered office at 7th Floor, Tech Park One
legal_concepts:
The obligations of confidentiality, 
however, shall survive the termination of this Agreement for a further period of five (5) 
years

Dispute Resolution  Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall 
be referred to and final ly resolved by arbitration in accordance with the Arbitration and 
Conciliation Act, 1996
Name: Sunita Sharma Address: Flat 801, Royal Palms, Goregaon, Mumbai 400065

The Parties agree that the competent courts  in Mumbai, 
India shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim that arises out of or in 
connection with this Agreement

(InnovateNext and DataWise are hereinafter collectively referred to as the ‚Äú Parties ‚Äù and 
individually as a ‚Äú Party ‚Äù)

Term and Termination  This Agreement shall be effective as of the Effective Date and 
shall remain in effec t for a period of three (3) years

Return of Information  Upon the written request of the Disclosing Party or upon the 
termination of this Agreement, the Receiving Party shall promptly return or, at the Disclosing 
Party's direction, destroy all documents and materials (and all copies thereof) containing the 
Disclosing Party's Confidential Information

Exclusions from Confidential Information  The obligations under Clause 2 shall not 
apply to informatio n that the Receiving Party can demonstrate: a

The Parties are interested in exploring a potential strategic partnership to develop and 
market an AI -driven predictive analy tics platform (the ‚Äú Purpose ‚Äù)

This includes, without limitation, all business plans, financial information, 
customer lists, technical data, trade secrets, know -how, designs, source codes, marketing 
strategies, and any other information wh ich is either marked as "confidential" or which by its 
nature ought to be considered confidential

MUTUAL NON -DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT  
This Mutual Non -Disclosure Agreement (the ‚Äú Agreement ‚Äù) is entered into on this 22nd day 
of August, 2025 (the ‚Äú Effective Date ‚Äù)

Hold and maintain the 
Confidential Information in strict confidence and take all reasonab le precautions to protect 
such Confidential Information (including, without limitation, all precautions the Receiving 
Party employs with respect to its own confidential materials)

Definition of Confidential Information  ‚ÄúConfidential Information ‚Äù shall mean any and 
all information, whether tangible or intangible, disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the 
Receiving Party, in any form whatsoever, including but not limited  to written, oral, visual, or 
electronic forms

Is required to be disclosed by 
law, regulation, or court order, provided that the Receiving Party gives th e Disclosing Party 
prompt written notice of such requirement to permit the Disclosing Party to seek a protective 
order or other appropriate remedy

Restrict access to Confidential Information to its employees, 
directors, advisors, or consultants on a "need -to-know" basis, provided that such 
Representatives are bound by confidentiality obligations no less restrictive than those 
contained in this Agreement

In the course of discussions concerning the Purpose, each Party (as a ‚Äú Disclosing Party ‚Äù) 
may disclose to the other Party (as a ‚Äú Receiving Party ‚Äù) certain non -public, confidential, or 
proprietary information

No License  Nothing i n this Agreement is intended to grant any rights to the Receiving 
Party under any patent, copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property right of the 
Disclosing Party, nor shall this Agreement grant the Receiving Party any rights in or to the 
Confide ntial Information other than the limited right to review such information for the 
Purpose
